analysis.description:
Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#238-240) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#240)

AllowanceCrowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#313-319) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFrom(tokenWallet,_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#316-319)

PreSquirrelICO.addManyToWhitelist has external calls inside a loop:
	- membership.setMemberTier(_beneficiaries[i],1) (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#598-602)

TimedCrowdsale.TimedCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#468-476) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_openingTime >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#470-474)

TimedCrowdsale.hasClosed (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#479-487) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp > closingTime (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#486)

PreSquirrelICO.hasStarted (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#615-624) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp >= openingTime (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#620-623)
Ownable.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#37-47) should be declared external
ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/20/0x233d2daad4018fae14c69b2830bf97057c7fb1b5.sol#51-52) should be declared external
